docs.snippet: BUENOS AIRES, March 8 (U.P.) -- President Juan D. Peron today called for an all-out struggle to crush his opponents. He described them as the "enemies of Argentine economic independence -- the remnants of the oligarchy, opposition politicians,...
docs.lead_paragraph: BUENOS AIRES, March 8 (U.P.) -- President Juan D. Peron today called for an all-out struggle to crush his opponents. He described them as the "enemies of Argentine economic independence -- the remnants of the oligarchy, opposition politicians, Communists and the press."
docs.abstract: Pres Peron calls for drive to crush foes, labor leaders meeting; attacks Communists, press and other groups

headline.main: PERON LISTS FOES IN CALL TO BATTLE; Argentine President Asks for Boycott of Hostile Press and Pressure on 'Oligarchs'

docs.snippet: Health inspectors, combing the city for Analbis suppositories, a drug suspected of having caused the death of twelve small children in five States, have seized 3,044 doses of the compound since its embargo Tuesday, Health Commissioner Israel...
docs.lead_paragraph: Health inspectors, combing the city for Analbis suppositories, a drug suspected of having caused the death of twelve small children in five States, have seized 3,044 doses of the compound since its embargo Tuesday, Health Commissioner Israel Weinstein reported yesterday.

docs.snippet: ASUNCION, Paraguay, March 18 (U.P.) -- The rebel radio in Concepcion said the crews of four Government planes, sent out Saturday to bomb the rebels in Concepcion, had landed and joined the revolutionary forces. The entire air force previously had...
docs.lead_paragraph: ASUNCION, Paraguay, March 18 (U.P.) -- The rebel radio in Concepcion said the crews of four Government planes, sent out Saturday to bomb the rebels in Concepcion, had landed and joined the revolutionary forces. The entire air force previously had been reported loyal to President Morinigo.
docs.abstract: Govt declares state of war; Col F Smith assumes command of Govt forces; crews of 4 Govt planes reptd to have deserted to rebels; rebel gains discussed; Morinigo charges revolt is led by Communists
